metadata.title: CVE-2021-44921 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability exists in gpac 1.1.0 in thegf_isom_parse_movie_boxes_internal function, which causes a segmentationfault and application crash.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
